title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 01, 2021

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Development / Discovery

*   [pre-commit-hooks.nix (⭐670)](https://github.com/cachix/pre-commit-hooks.nix) - Run linters/formatters at commit time and on your CI.
items.content_html:
Development / Discovery

  • pre-commit-hooks.nix (⭐670) - Run linters/formatters at commit time and on your CI.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Development

- API: [jsDelivr (⭐217)](https://github.com/jsdelivr/data.jsdelivr.com)

  Description: Package info and download stats on jsDelivr CDN

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes



### Government

- API: [Open Government, UK](https://data.gov.uk/)

  Description: UK Government Open Data

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### Network / Barcode

*   [CodyFire (⭐256)](https://github.com/CodyFlame/CodyFire) - Powerful Codable API requests builder and manager for iOS. Based on Alamofire.

### Button / Barcode

*   [IGStoryButtonKit (⭐36)](https://github.com/KaoruMuta/IGStoryButtonKit) - Easy-to-use button with rich animation inspired by instagram stories.

### Transition / Barcode

*   [SPLarkController (⭐988)](https://github.com/ivanvorobei/SPLarkController) - Custom transition between two controller. Translate to top.
*   [SPStorkController (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/ivanvorobei/SPStorkController) - Now playing controller from Apple Music. Customisable height.
items.content_html:
Network / Barcode

  • CodyFire (⭐256) - Powerful Codable API requests builder and manager for iOS. Based on Alamofire.

Button / Barcode

  • IGStoryButtonKit (⭐36) - Easy-to-use button with rich animation inspired by instagram stories.

Transition / Barcode

  • SPLarkController (⭐988) - Custom transition between two controller. Translate to top.
  • SPStorkController (⭐2.7k) - Now playing controller from Apple Music. Customisable height.

items.title: Awesome R Learning Resources
items.content_text:
### Topic Areas / Web Scraping

*   [Web Scraping Reference: Cheat Sheet for Web Scraping using R (⭐396)](https://github.com/yusuzech/r-web-scraping-cheat-sheet) - Guide, reference and cheatsheet on web scraping using rvest, httr and Rselenium. Author: [yifyan et al.](https://github.com/yusuzech)

### Topic Areas / Uncategorized

*   [From base R to stringr](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/articles/from-base.html) - This vignette compares stringr functions to their base R equivalents to help users transitioning from using base R to stringr. Author: Sara Stoudt.
items.content_html:
Topic Areas / Web Scraping

  • Web Scraping Reference: Cheat Sheet for Web Scraping using R (⭐396) - Guide, reference and cheatsheet on web scraping using rvest, httr and Rselenium. Author: yifyan et al.

Topic Areas / Uncategorized

  • From base R to stringr - This vignette compares stringr functions to their base R equivalents to help users transitioning from using base R to stringr. Author: Sara Stoudt.

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### Cache

*   [Caching Manager (⭐2)](https://github.com/jbluemink/SitecoreCachingManager) - A console for easy Sitecore 10 cache management.
*   [Cache Processing Instance (⭐2)](https://github.com/ParTech/Cache-Processing-Instance) - A proof-of-concept for a dedicated HTML cache processing instance.
items.content_html:
Cache

  • Caching Manager (⭐2) - A console for easy Sitecore 10 cache management.
  • Cache Processing Instance (⭐2) - A proof-of-concept for a dedicated HTML cache processing instance.

items.title: Awesome Flask
items.content_text:
### Conferences / Testing

*   [PyConWeb](https://twitter.com/pyconweb) - Covers Django, Tornado, Flask, API frameworks. AsyncIO, networking, Frontend, JavaScript, and web security.
items.content_html:
Conferences / Testing

  • PyConWeb - Covers Django, Tornado, Flask, API frameworks. AsyncIO, networking, Frontend, JavaScript, and web security.

items.title: Awesome Biological Visualizations
items.content_text:
### Genomics

*   [Gosling](https://gosling.js.org) - A grammar-based toolkit for scalable and interactive genomics data visualization.
items.content_html:
Genomics

  • Gosling - A grammar-based toolkit for scalable and interactive genomics data visualization.

items.title: Awesome Deep Learning
items.content_text:
### Researchers / Tools

*   [hub (⭐8.7k)](https://github.com/activeloopai/Hub) - Fastest unstructured dataset management for TensorFlow/PyTorch by activeloop.ai. Stream & version-control data. Converts large data into single     numpy-like array on the cloud, accessible on any machine.
items.content_html:
Researchers / Tools

  • hub (⭐8.7k) - Fastest unstructured dataset management for TensorFlow/PyTorch by activeloop.ai. Stream & version-control data. Converts large data into single numpy-like array on the cloud, accessible on any machine.

items.title: Awesome Streaming
items.content_text:
### Table of Contents / Streaming SQL

*   [ksqlDB (⭐214)](https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql) \[Java] - A cloud-native, source-available [database](https://ksqldb.io/) purpose-built for stream processing applications
*   [Materialize](https://materialize.com) \[Rust] - A source-available streaming SQL engine for maintaining materialized views on data from message brokers and databases.
items.content_html:
Table of Contents / Streaming SQL

  • ksqlDB (⭐214) [Java] - A cloud-native, source-available database purpose-built for stream processing applications
  • Materialize [Rust] - A source-available streaming SQL engine for maintaining materialized views on data from message brokers and databases.
